name: VIDEO: National Adoption Month Celebration Unites 39 Children with Families
description: The County’s Child and Family Well-Being Department hosted its yearly Adoption Day Party at the San Diego Juvenile Courthouse in honor of November being National Adoption Month.

affiliation.name: County of San Diego Communications Office

articleContent:
The County’s Child and Family Well-Being Department hosted its yearly Adoption Day Party at the San Diego Juvenile Courthouse in honor of November being National Adoption Month.  The Adoption Party is a joyous celebration where families become official. This year, 30 families finalized the adoption of 39 children.
If you would like to learn more about being a resource parent, visit www.sdcares4kids.com.
